attributes.action: Ban all single-use vape pens & ban all vape & nicotine product advertisements
attributes.additional_details:
Because britains streets are being strewn with this litter like a Plague of locusts;
because that's more plastic pollution; and more batteries from more chinese mines. 

Also, teenagers are drawn to the brightly coloured, fruity flavoured vapes - tactics used against our senses - as they are on display.
These vape pens are as poisonous - if not more - than clean tobacco products; if not the cigarettes & tobacco with many additives. 
They need to have all advertising cut, & be regulated better.
attributes.background: The single use vape pens are being strewn across our streets everywhere - just like choc wrappers - for our refuse collection people to deal with; more plastic pollution. Also, to ban the advertisement of all nicotine products on TV & in shops; they need to be behind the counter, like tobacco.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Ban the import, manufacture, and sale of disposable e-cigarettes or vapes: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/638536

Ban all advertising for vapes and e-cigarettes: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/629546
